result: As you approach the glowing doorway, a sudden gust of wind sweeps through the chamber, extinguishing the torches on the walls. new_situation: You find yourself in a vast, cavernous room, bathed in a soft, otherworldly glow. On the far side of the room, you see a figure slumped against the wall. As you squint to see better, your heart leaps - it's Eledor, unconscious but alive. You can either try to sneak past the creature to reach Eledor and the artifact, or you can confront the creature directly.
